name: Primark Ltd
goal: Primark is an international retailer, headquartered in Dublin, offering high quality fashion at value for money prices
interests: Consumer Affairs, Customs, Enlargement, Enterprise, External Relations, Food Safety, Internal Market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: We follow those EU initiatives, policies and legislative files relevant to the retail of fashion and related goods, such as: External trade and market access; Consumer and product safety; Environment/Sustainability and Corporate Social Responsibility; IP protection; Customs and global supply chain initiatives; Digital agenda and digital market policies
